name: TilesCraft
description:
Welcome to TilesCraft!

Game Description:

TilesCraft is a simple, relaxing survival sandbox game, where you can build to your hearts desire. Your stranded on a survival island, you have to build and survive in a world of your own making. What will you build? 

How to play:

[SPACE] [A] [D] to move
[Z] to switch break/place
[Q] to open crafting table
[E] to open inventory
[R] to interact
[O] to eat/drink
[Arrows] to switch hotbar slots
[Left Click] to place, break, craft, move items in hotbars

Features:

  • Simple Crafting
  • Flexible hotbar/inventory
  • Gather resources to craft items
  • Day and night cycle
  • Rain cycle
  • Eating & drinking
  • More coming soon!

Shout Outs!

Thanks to Zapsplat.com , and SVL for all of the amazing sounds, and the sound track of the game!
